questions.question: Is there a large title saying “Catch the Wave” placed above the horizon?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the title “Catch the Wave” is present in large white letters towards the top of the image, directly above the visible horizon line formed by the meeting of sea and sky. The placement above the horizon is distinct, as the text is situated in the sky area above where the ocean waves are visible.

questions.question: Is there a note in the bottom-left corner that reads “Summer Adventures – 2025”?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the bottom-left corner features a note reading “Summer Adventures – 2025” in white text. This note is formatted in a smaller size compared to the title, and is positioned against the sandy beach area, with the year '2025' explicitly included.

questions.question: Is the title “Catch the Wave” visibly larger compared to other elements in the image?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the title “Catch the Wave” is displayed in large, bold white letters at the top, contrasting notably in size against the smaller text in the bottom-left corner which reads “Summer Adventures – 2025”. The title’s prominence is evident due to its size and bold formatting.

questions.question: Is the title “Catch the Wave” positioned above the visible horizon line in the image?
questions.explanation: The title “Catch the Wave” in Image B is located above the visible horizon line. The horizon is where the ocean meets the sky, and the text is positioned in the open sky area at the top of the image, confirming it is indeed above the horizon.

questions.question: Does the note in the bottom-left corner include the year “2025” as part of the text?
questions.explanation: Analyzing Image B, the note in the bottom-left corner clearly states “Summer Adventures – 2025”. The inclusion of a dash and the year “2025” is explicit in the text, confirming that the year is a part of the overall note.
